class_notes: Online with synchronous sessions - Zoom. Face-to-face intensives TBD.
course_description: Students will address increasingly complex health problems common to children and adults, with emphasis on primary care management and pharmacologic and non-pharmacologic interventions. Culturally competent care to diverse patients and HP 2020 goals will be addressed.
prerequisites: NRSG 545 as prerequisite and NRSG 518 as co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 1868, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2-3:50p, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
